humanum_full_description_en:
From " speak " to " inch ", the original meaning is governance and rectification. "Shuowen": "Governance. From words to inches." "Zuo Zhuan‧ Xuangong Twelve Years": "Since Chu's suppression of yong, his monarch has never been able to ask the people of the country. When there is no day, you can't neglect to avoid fear." Du Yinan: "Discuss, cure."

" Discussion " can be expressed explore, research. "Book of Shang Jun‧ Changing the Law": "Consider the changes in the world, seek the foundation of the law, and seek the way for the people."

" Discussion " can also mean seeking. Jin Luji "Wen Fu": "Or because the branches vibrate the leaves, or follow the waves to discuss the source."

" Discussion " also means condemnation and public condemnation. "Eight Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xiang Gong": "Today Chu came to discuss: "Why do women call soldiers at Cai?"

" Discussing " can also mean killing. Han Cao Cao "Haoli Xing": "There are righteous men in the Kwantung, who are fighting against the gang."

" Discussion " also refers to seeking and requesting. "Book of Jin-Wei Heng Biography": "The spectator pays for wine, begs for money and destroys it."

" Discuss " in modern Chinese can also refer to marrying and provoking. "Awakening the World, Constant Words-The Oil Seller Exclusively Oiran": "Fortunately, two meet each other, you are greedy for my love, and you can't give up, one is willing to ask, the other is willing to marry." Qing Jiang Shiquan "Snowman-Appreciating Stone": "But I hope there are more elderly people and fewer hungry men on the street, but they don’t plant beans or melons. All are asking for themselves."
humanum_short_description_en: From " words " to " inches ", the original meaning is governance and rectification.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，從「寸」，本義為治理、整治。《說文》：「治也。从言从寸。」《左傳‧宣公十二年》：「楚自克庸以來，其君無日不討國人，而訓之于民生之不易，禍至之無日，戒懼之不可以怠。」杜預注：「討，治也。」

　　「討」可表示探討、研究。《商君書‧更法》：「慮世事之變，討正法之本，求使民之道。」

　　「討」還可表示尋找。晉陸機〈文賦〉：「或因枝以振葉，或沿波而討源。」

　　「討」亦表示聲討、公開譴責。《左傳‧襄公八年》：「今楚來討曰：『女何故稱兵於蔡？』」

　　「討」還可指誅殺。漢曹操〈蒿里行〉：「關東有義士，興兵討群凶。」

　　「討」也指謀取、索取。《晉書‧衛恆傳》：「顧觀者以酬酒，討錢足而滅之。」

　　近現代漢語中「討」還可指娶、招惹。《醒世恒言‧賣油郎獨占花魁》：「幸然兩下相逢，你貪我愛，割捨不下，一個願討，一個願嫁。」 清蔣士銓《雪中人‧賞石》：「但願人間長者多，街頭餓夫少，卻不道種豆栽瓜，皆是自討。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，從「寸」，本義為治理、整治。

Radicals: 言, 寸  (say, measurement)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say using a measurement device (like a ruler) is a good way to chastise someone. They do something bad? Chastise them by slapping their wrists, their feet, their eyes, ears, anything! They say something out of turn? CHASTISE THEM!
Imagine being chastised with a measurement device. Think how horrible it would be getting hit on your knuckles, your nose, or the back of your head. It would be awful. Imagine this experience.
Reading Mnemonic
You're being chastised because you tried to say something in English in とうきょう. Everyone around you slowly turned around, eyes aflame and rulers in hand, ready to chastise you for uttering those forbidden words.
How could you say something in English while you're in とうきょう?! After you went to all the trouble to learn all this kanji and Japanese? Geez, we almost think you deserve to be chastised...
